news_description_html: Our work OpenFunGraph was accepted at CVPR '25 as a Highlight.
Our work Search3D was accepted at RA-L.
The fourth iteration of our Open-Vocabulary 3D Scene Understanding Workshop will be held in conjunction with CVPR '25 in Nashville.
I started my PhD at ETH Zurich and I joined the Max Planck ETH Center for Learning Systems as a doctoral fellow.
Our work SceneFun3D was accepted at CVPR '24 in Seattle as an Oral presentation.
The second iteration of our Open-Vocabulary 3D Scene Understanding Workshop will be held in conjunction with CVPR '24 in Seattle.
Our work Multi-CLIP was accepted at BMVC '23 in Aberdeen as an Oral presentation.
